contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=March 2008}} {{Infobox musical artist | name = Zyklon-B | image = | caption = | image_size = | background = group_or_band | alias = | origin = [[Norway]] | genre = [[Black metal]] | years_active = 1995–1999 | label = [[Malicious Records]] | associated_acts = [[Zyklon]]<br>[[Satyricon (band)|Satyricon]]<br>[[Emperor (band)|Emperor]] | website = | current_members = Frost<br>Samoth<br>Ihsahn<br>Aldrahn | past_members = }} '''Zyklon-B''' was a [[Norway|Norwegian]] [[black metal]] band founded in 1995. The band’s members were [[Samoth|Tomas "Samoth" Thormodsæter Haugen]] ([[Electric guitar|guitar]] and [[Bass guitar|bass]]) and [[Ihsahn|Vegard "Ihsahn" Sverre Tveitan]] ([[Electronic keyboard|keyboard]]) from [[Emperor (band)|Emperor]], [[Kjetil-Vidar Haraldstad|Kjetil "Frost" Haraldstad]] ([[Drum kit|Drums]]) from [[Satyricon (band)|Satyricon]] and Björn "Aldrahn" Dencker Gjerde ([[singing|vocals]]) from [[Dødheimsgard]]. Their lyrics deal mainly with death, apocalypse and warfare. The band recorded only one [[Extended play|EP]]; other versions of the featured songs were featured on split releases with [[Mayhem (band)|Mayhem]] and Swordmaster. The band [[Zyklon]] featuring members of Zyklon-B is often thought to be the same band, which is wrong. The name refers to [[Zyklon B]], a gas used in [[gas chamber]]s during the [[Holocaust]]. However, the band states that "Zyklon-B is not related to any political or racial preference". == Discography == {{Infobox album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = Blood Must Be Shed | Type = EP | Artist = Zyklon-B | Cover = Bloodmustbeshed.jpg | Released = 1995 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Black metal]] | Length = 10:54 | Label = Malicious Records | Producer = | This album = ''Blood Must Be Shed''<br />(1995) | Next album = | Italic title = no }} * ''Blood Must Be Shed'' EP (1995) *#"Mental Orgasm" – 2:54 *#"Bloodsoil" – 2:25 *#"Warfare" – 5:35 * ''Blood Must Be Shed / Wraths of Time'' split EP with Swordmaster (1996) *#"Mental Orgasm" – 2:54 *#"Bloodsoil" – 2:25 *#"Warfare" – 5:35 *#"Wraths of Time" – 5:37 *#"Upon Blood and Ashes" – 5:17 *#"Conspiracy - Preview" – 2:56 * ''Necrolust / Total Warfare'' split single with Mayhem (1999) *#"Necrolust (Unreleased Studio Version)" – 3:43 *#"Total Warfare (Sea Serpent Remix)" – 5:46 {{DEFAULTSORT:Zyklon B}} [[Category:Norwegian black metal musical groups]] [[Category:Musical groups established in 1995]] [[Category:1995 establishments in Norway]] [[Category:Musical groups disestablished in the 1990s]] [[Category:1990s disestablishments in Norway]] [[Category:Musical groups from Norway with local place of origin missing]] <!-- hidden maintenance category -->
